H0.text: Mount Ararat is in which country. Armenia

H1.text: Mount Ararat is in which country. Iran

H2.text: Mount Ararat is in which country. Azerbaijan

H3.text: Mount Ararat is in which country. Turky

A4.text: Mount Ararat is located in the Eastern Anatolia region of Turkey, between the provinces of Ağrı and Iğdır.

A5.text: Mount Ararat is located near the border with Iran, Armenia and Nakhchivan exclave of Azerbaijan.
